result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Russell Ralph Haupt Jr

records.addlTxt: 01:32 PM Defendant, Russell Ralph Haupt, appeared by audio Zoom. Brenda L. Yaskal appeared for the State of Wisconsin by video Zoom. Defendant had requested a hearing to quash the warrant. Judge Cross has a conflict with the case. Defendant requested to waive the confict for todays hearing. Court granted request. Reason for missed appearance given. Address updated by the defendant. State requested the warrant remain and a cash bond be issued with the warrant quashed upon posted payment. Defendant argued bond.  Court will not quash warrant until the defendant appears in person at the jail or in court. No bond has been set. State requested corrected address from defendant, address given on the record does not exsist. Defendant disconnected before court was ended. Warrant remains. 1:46 PM

Hearing on December 4, 2020 at 01:30 pm.
Verbal notice was given to defendant upon his request.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Warrant issued due to Defendant's failure to appear for court hearing/pretrial on Oct. 7, 2015
notice of October 7 status sent to defendant at 1928 W College Ave., Appleton WI - "Return to Sender, not at this address, Unable to Forward."

ADDRESS INFO for Russell Ralph Haupt Jr
Current: 1928 W. College Ave, Appleton, WI 54914 United States  (Effective: 08-25-2015)
Prior: 1490 Martin Street, Madison, WI 53703
Letter requesting a reset of the jury trial - witness unavailable.  Also requesting a telephone conference to get defendants current address.  Filed by ADA Crystal Long
Notice of October 29 jury trial sent to defendant at 1490 Martin St, Madison, WI 53703 - "Return to Sender, not deliverable, Unable to Forward."
Jury trial at 10-29-2015 09:00 am with letter
Jury trial on August 13, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Defendant, Russell Ralph Haupt, appeared. Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Waiver of Preliminary Hearing filed. Court found probable cause, bound defendant over.  Information filed, reading waived. Defendant stood mute. Court entered not guilty plea, jury trial to be set. Bond continued.

Defendant, Russell Ralph Haupt, appeared. Jordan Lippert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant would like an atty.  New dates set.  Bond remains.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 19, 2014 at 02:00 pm.  Hearing scheduled for December 11, 2014 at 02:45 pm.

Defendant Russell Ralph Haupt by video, in custody with attorney Randall M. Holtz.  Troy D Cross appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  $2500.00 signature bond.  Standard felony conditions.  Waives time limits.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 17, 2014 at 03:00 pm.  Hearing scheduled for October 17, 2014 at 02:45 pm.
